definitions.title: n.f
definitions.body: meadow-saffron or crocus (colchicum autumnale, Linn.) (Syr. h.ams.aloyto0, v. GES:Comm. Is 35:1 Löw:p. 174, No. 128; As. ḫabaṣillatu VR:32, 62 is a marsh-plant, reed; cf. Zim:BP 59 Dl:HA 34; Pr 82; also Che:l. c. and crit. n.);—[[הַשָּׁרוֹן]] ´[[ח]] [[שׁוֹשַׁנַּת הָעֲמָקִים]] Ct So 2:1 (fig. of Shulamite), [[וְתָגֵל]] :[[עֲרָבָה וְתִפְרַח כַּחֲבַצָּֽלֶת]] Is 35:1 (narcissus Che:Is 35:1 cf. Conder:PEF, 1878, 46 Tristr:NHB 476 al.)
